title: France panorama. [No. 68/27]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. France goes to the polls - the first round of the legislative elections has resulted in sharp Gaullist gains. 2. From atop the “Imperial” - New “imperial” type two-decker buses are put to use in Paris. 3. 14th July - France on parade. 4. The Andre Masson exhibition - an exhibition of Andre Masson’s works at a gallery near the Seine River.
